Key Match Events: Raphinha scored the opening goal from the penalty spot in the 38th minute.
Raphinha scored a second penalty goal in the 54th minute.
Andreas Pereira scored a stunning overhead kick in the 71st minute.
Luiz Henrique scored an unstoppable finish three minutes after Pereira's goal.
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil manager Dorival Junior temporarily silenced his critics with the victory.
Brazil ended the current cycle of 2026 FIFA World Cup Qualifying matches four points above the final automatic qualification position.
Peru's best chance of reappearing at the World Cup now looks to be the seventh-place inter-confederation playoff position.
